scripts.build_frontend: cd src/frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build_marketing_frontend: cd src/static-site && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: dfx deps deploy && dfx deploy league && dfx canister deposit-cycles 35000000000000 stadiumFactory && dfx canister deposit-cycles 35000000000000 teamFactory
scripts.reset: dfx stop && dfx start --clean --background && npm run deploy
